data: In the “but” or living-room (as it was termed in Scotland) of a little whitewashed thatched cottage near Auld Ayr in the land of the Doon, sat a quiet, sedate trio of persons consisting of two men and a woman.
living-room | thatched cottage | Auld Ayr | land of the Doon

Highland Mary: The Romance of a Poet
A Novel
Legge, Clayton Mackenzie; Kirkpatrick, William Arber-Brown, 1880- [Illustrator]
